steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Place the cursor where you want to insert the caption.
Go to the 'References' tab in the Word ribbon.
Click on the 'Insert Caption' button in the 'Captions' group.
In the 'Caption' dialog box, select the desired label from the 'Label' dropdown menu.
Enter the caption text in the 'Caption' field.
Choose any additional options, such as numbering or position, if needed.
Click the 'OK' button to insert the caption.
Review the inserted caption to ensure it appears correctly.
Save the document to apply the changes.
